titles.title: Day of Wrath, O Day of Mourning

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Day of wrath, O day of mourning! See fulfilled the prophet's warning, Heav'n and earth in ashes burning.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Oh, what fear man's bosom rendeth When from Heav'n the Judge descendeth On whose sentence all dependeth!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Wondrous sound the trumpet flingeth, Through earth's sepulchers it ringeth, All before the throne it bringeth.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Death is struck and nature quaking; All creation is awaking, To its Judge an answer making.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Lo, the book, exactly worded, Wherein all hath been recorded; Thence shall judgment be awarded.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: When the Judge His seat attaineth And each hidden deed arraigneth, Nothing unavenged remaineth.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: What shall I, frail man, be pleading? Who for me be interceding When the just are mercy needing?

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: King of majesty tremendous, Who dost free salvation send us, Fount of pity, then befriend us.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Think, good Jesus, my salvation Caused Thy wondrous incarnation; Leave me not to reprobation!

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: Faint and weary Thou hast sought me, On the cross of suff'ring bought me; Shall such grace be vainly brought me?

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Righteous Judge, for sin's pollution
Grant Thy gift of absolution
Ere that day of retribution!

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
Guilty, now I pour my moaning,
All my shame with anguish owning:
Spare, O God, Thy suppliant groaning!

verse.name: v13
verse.lines:
From that sinful woman shriven,
From the dying thief forgiven,
Thou to me a hope hast given.

verse.name: v14
v15
verse.lines:
With Thy favored sheep, oh, place me!
Nor among the goats abase me,
But to Thy right hand upraise me.

verse.name: v16
verse.lines:
While the wicked are confounded,
Doomed to flames of woe unbounded,
Call me, with Thy saints surrounded.

verse.name: v17
verse.lines:
Low I kneel with heart submission, See, like ashes,
my contrition; Help me in my last condition!

verse.name: v18
verse.lines:
Day of sorrow, day of weeping, When, in dust no
longer sleeping, Man awakes in Thy dread keeping!
